external_games.name: Samurai Jack: Code of the Samurai

name: Samurai Jack: Code of the Samurai
summary: Placed into enemy territory, Samurai Jack must use his wits and mastery of ancient weapons to navigate 3 treacherous levels to defeat Aku! In addition to his sword, Jack can also unlock 6 additional secret weapons including: ninja stars, flaming arrows, a mace, shields, a longsword, and metal gauntlets.
